product_description: Roomy side pockets add utilitarian appeal to these stretch-denim jeans in a slim, modern fit.
product_details_and_care:
Roomy side pockets add utilitarian appeal to these stretch-denim jeans in a slim, modern fit.
32" inseam; 11" leg opening; 11" front rise; 14" back rise (size 32x34)
Drawstring waist
Five-pocket style
Side flap pockets
98% cotton, 2% elastane
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #5934704
product_size_info:
True to size.
Slim but comfortable through the seat and thigh.
Tapers slightly below the knee for a narrow leg opening.
Mid rise.
